title: Manchester United Champions League shirt.
content:
The lettering on the ’Europe’ shirts differs from the ones used in the Premier League... Can anybody ID this typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/prd_maxzoom_237924-666-Champ-10_3730.jpg)

Charles.

 [‹ (x) Dark.Room.Notes website rounded tech sans - (similar to) Isonorm {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40103 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Radiohead "In Rainbows" album cover - Transport Medium {Richard Hards} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40112 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Charles Grant

comments.content: Two things — one it’s probably a custom designed face, two it’s butt ugly. See how badly the curves join up with the straights. And it looks like the top and bottom of the 0 is clipped off instead of having an overshoot.
